Name: MPI_MODE_DELETE_ON_CLOSE
Description:
MPI_MODE_DELETE_ON_CLOSE is a flag that can be passed to MPI_File_open to specify that the file to be opened must be deleted upon closure. It is equivalent to performing MPI_File_delete.
Other flags are MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_MODE_RDWR, MPI_MODE_WRONLY, MPI_MODE_CREATE, MPI_MODE_EXCL, MPI_MODE_UNIQUE_OPEN, MPI_MODE_SEQUENTIAL and MPI_MODE_APPEND.
